TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {13958=DoD, GSA, and NASA are issuing a correction to FAR Case 2012-023; Uniform Procurement Identification (Item III), which was published in the Federal Register at 79 FR 61739, October 14, 2014., 27857=§ 2306 - Kinds of contracts, 32111=§ 2336, 31215=§ 2330 - Procurement of contract services: management structure, 30076=§ 2322 - Repealed., 31990=§ 2335 - Prohibition on collection of political information, 26834=§ 2304 - Contracts: competition requirements, 28832=§ 2312 - Remission of liquidated damages, 28591=§ 2310 - Determinations and decisions, 29588=§ 2317 - Repealed., 29867=§ 2320 - Rights in technical data, 30542=§ 2324 - Allowable costs under defense contracts, 28385=§ 2308 - Buy-to-budget acquisition: end items, 31701=§ 2333 - Joint policies on requirements definition, contingency program management, and contingency contracting, 29158=§ 2314 - Laws inapplicable to agencies named in section 2303 of this title, 30742=§ 2326 - Undefinitized contractual actions: restrictions, 28492=§ 2309 - Allocation of appropriations, 48888=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to implement a section of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) for Fiscal Year (FY) 2013 to include in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System (FAPIIS), to the extent practicable, identification of any immediate owner or subsidiary, and all predecessors of an offeror that held a Federal contract or grant within the last three years. The objective is to provide a more comprehensive understanding of the performance and integrity of the corporation before awarding a Federal contract., 32202=§ 2337 - Life-cycle management and product support, 29294=§ 2315 - Law inapplicable to the procurement of automatic data processing equipment and services for certain defense purposes, 32943=Title 48 published on 2014-10-01, 26108=§ 2302 - Definitions, 30987=§ 2328 - Release of technical data under Freedom of Information Act: recovery of costs, 29764=§ 2319 - Encouragement of new competitors, 30652=§ 2325 - Restructuring costs, 54352=DoD, GSA, and NASA are proposing to amend the Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) to further implement the inflation adjustment of acquisition-related dollar thresholds. A statute requires an adjustment every five years of acquisition-related thresholds for inflation using the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers, except for the Construction Wage Rate Requirements statute (Davis-Bacon Act), Service Contract Labor Standards statute, and trade agreements thresholds. DoD, GSA, and NASA are also proposing to use the same methodology to adjust nonstatutory FAR acquisition-related thresholds in 2015., 27613=§ 2305 - Contracts: planning, solicitation, evaluation, and award procedures, 31604=§ 2332 - Share-in-savings contracts, 31135=§ 2329 - Repealed., 30860=§ 2327 - Contracts: consideration of national security objectives, 28934=§ 2313 - Examination of records of contractor, 28690=§ 2311 - Assignment and delegation of procurement functions and responsibilities, 31874=§ 2334 - Independent cost estimation and cost analysis, 26657=§ 2303 - Applicability of chapter, 29962=§ 2321 - Validation of proprietary data restrictions, 29668=§ 2318 - Advocates for competition, 29481=§ 2316 - Disclosure of identity of contractor, 25952=§ 2301 - Repealed. Pub.
